title: COVID-19 VACCINATION < Return to News
description: Regent Medical Care provides comprehensive health care, including Urgent and Family Care, Chiropractic, Physical Therapy and Massage Therapy
cleaned_text: COVID-19 VACCINATION We have Moderna, Pfizer and J & J vaccines, and are vaccinating 6 months and older. We have the new Bivalent booster. [< Return to News](https://regentmedicalcare.com/news) Please call our office at 602-494-7700 and schedule an appointment. You may download the Covid-19 screening form [here](https://regentmedicalcare.com/images/uploads/Covid-19 screening and consent.pdf)and bring a filled form to your appointment. Or email the form and request an appointment at [regentmedical@yahoo.com](mailto:regentmedical@yahoo.com?subject=Covid%20vaccine%20appointment) Phone (602) 494 7700 [Map & Directions](/contact/) Hours: Now offering Telemed visits. Monday - Wednesday 9:00 am - 6:00 pm Thursday & Friday 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Saturday & Sunday Closed Call to schedule your virtual appointment. Now offering Telemed visits.
